title: Large-Scale Course for Strengthening Lifelong Learning Capabilities Through Metacognition

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and self-directed learning experience
context.additional_context: Course emphasizing the acquisition of lifelong learning strategies linked to language domains (foreign languages/literacy)

learning_goals: Learners can design at least three self-monitoring tools using metacognitive strategies.
Learners can improve their learning process by writing self-reflective learning journals at least once a week.
Learners can reset learning objectives based on peer feedback in online environments (e.g., Zoom).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
